education.title: Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur
education.description: Activities and Societies: Sub-Head at Child Rights and You ( CRY ) IIT Kharagpur . Event Head at Electrical Engineering Society ( EES ) IIT Kharagpur I have worked in various teams with members from Institute officials, Alumni and Students, and helped build systems that give efficient results, affecting the welfare of the campus student body. All these experiences have inculcated in me the drive to work towards solving day to day problems faced by an organisation, and work towards the best result for the same. I am Abhijeet Kumar, Third Year Undergraduate Student of the Department of Electrical Engineering enroll in its B-Tech Course at Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur. I am from Ranchi, Jharkhand. My hobbies are : reading books , playing cricket , football and badminton . I am the boarder of RadhaKrishnan ( RK ) Hall of Residence , IIT Kharagpur.
education.description_html: Activities and Societies: Sub-Head at Child Rights and You ( CRY ) IIT Kharagpur . All these experiences have inculcated in me the drive to work towards solving day to day problems faced by an organisation, and work towards the best result for the same.
